contentrichtext.text: {{DISPLAYTITLE:Xi<sup>2</sup> Capricorni}} {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} :''For other star systems with this [[Bayer designation]], see [[Xi Capricorni]].'' {{Starbox short | name=ξ<sup>2</sup> Capricorni | epoch=[[J2000.0]] | constell=[[Capricornus]] | ra=20<sup>h</sup>12<sup>m</sup>25.9<sup>s</sup> | dec=−12°37′03″ | spectral=F7V | appmag_v=+5.84 | dist_ly=91.5 ± 2.4 | dist_pc=28.1 ± 0.7 | names=2 Capricorni, [[Harvard Revised catalogue|HR]] 7715, [[Henry Draper Catalogue|HD]] 191862, [[Gliese-Jahreiss catalogue|NN]] 4139, [[Bonner Durchmusterung|BD]]−13°5608, [[Hipparcos catalogue|HIP]] 99572, [[Smithsonian Astrophysical Observatory catalogue|SAO]] 163337, GC 28035, CCDM J20124-1237 }} '''Xi<sup>2</sup> Capricorni''' (ξ<sup>2</sup> Cap, ξ<sup>2</sup> Capricorni) is a [[star]] in the [[constellation]] [[Capricornus]]. ξ<sup>2</sup> Capricorni is a yellow-white [[stellar classification|F-type]] [[main sequence|main sequence dwarf]] with an [[apparent magnitude]] of +5.84. It is approximately 91.5 [[light year]]s from [[Earth]]. {{Stars of Capricornus}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Xi2 Capricorni}} [[Category:Bayer objects|Capricorni, Xi<sup>2< sup>]] [[Category:Capricornus (constellation)]] [[Category:F-type main-sequence stars]] {{Main-star-stub}}
